title: lolclient.exe Has stopped working.
body:
So I have been getting the this extremely annoying error for weeks now "lolclient.exe has stopped working" I've tried everything i've given League permission on my PC. Ive turned off my Firewalls completely

I even went as far as reinstalling windows 10 and setting everything up as new and it still crashes. Im running out of ideas. My roommate run League perfect fine and we basically have the same computer.

Does ANYONE have any idea whats going on?

Edit: Sometimes the game runs sometimes it doesnt its super super weird..

Saturday the game ran fine for about 6 hours then out of the blue it started crashes the moment I logged in...

replies.body:
This sounds very much like your client is disconnecting from our servers, causing the client to crash entirely. This is often caused by network settings that conflict with League, so I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this is not the case.

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable changes for you.
